Both films are engaging and offer unique perspectives on the themes of growing up and self-discovery. Enjoy!

On the other hand, "Why Did I Get Married?" is a captivating adaptation of Tyler Perry's stage play, exploring the trials of marriage and relationships, starring an impressive ensemble including Janet Jackson and Tyler Perry himself. Enjoy!

Given your preference for adult dramas, I'd highly recommend "Man on Fire" starring Denzel Washington. It's a thrilling story about a former CIA operative who becomes the protector of a young girl after a tragic event, exploring themes of vengeance and redemption.

If you're interested in something more supernatural, "The Violent Kind" might intrigue you. This film revolves around a group of bikers and their girlfriends being terrorized by a possessed girl and 50's-style gangsters. Taylor Cole stars in this suspenseful horror movie.

I'd highly recommend "A Bridge Too Far" for you. This epic war film features an all-star cast, including Sean Connery and Ryan O'Neal, and tells the story of Operation Market Garden during World War II. It's a gripping portrayal of one of history's most significant military operations that I believe you might enjoy!

If you fancy a romance with a touch of war backdrop, "A Farewell to Arms" is another great choice. This classic film stars Gary Cooper and Helen Hayes and follows the love story of an English nurse and an American ambulance driver during World War I. It's a timeless tale of love and sacrifice in the face of adversity. Enjoy the watch!

"Smilla's Sense of Snow" and "The Last Samurai" are two captivating films I'd like to recommend, each with a unique charm.

In "Smilla's Sense of Snow", Julia Ormond delivers an engrossing performance as Smilla, a woman investigating the mysterious death of a young Inuit boy. The film takes you on a thrilling journey from Copenhagen to Greenland.

On the other hand, "The Last Samurai" stars Tom Cruise as a mercenary who becomes entangled in Japan's samurai culture during the Meiji Restoration, offering a blend of action and historical drama that's sure to intrigue you!
